description: Complete system overview covering the Voice AI mortgage lead management system architecture, key components, and high-level data flow
Detailed documentation of the compliance engine implementation, including TCPA rules, calling window restrictions, DNC list integration, and state-specific regulations
Comprehensive documentation of lead qualification logic, queue processing algorithms, retry mechanisms, and contact scheduling systems
Technical documentation of the voice input handling system, including Gemini AI integration, transcription workflow, and mortgage-specific context processing
Detailed documentation of data structures for lead management, contact information, compliance records, and CRM integration data models
Documentation of integration patterns with Total Expert CRM, including bi-directional sync, disposition logging, and appointment setting workflows
